announcements.title: ElDewrito 0.7 Release
announcements.subtitle: The future of Halo
announcements.content:
ElDewrito 0.7 released on 20 April 2024. Maintenance and services for ElDewrito 0.6.1 QOL7 were shut down on the same day.
ElDewrito 0.7 is available to download at https://eldewrito.org/download. Go to https://eldewrito.org/guide for help and support
Join us on Discord at https://eldewrito.org/discord


â™¥ QOL Patch Team | Not affiliated with the ElDewrito team
